name: Crater Craft
description:
This is not your usual farming game! Are you ready to build your dream? Let’s get started!
It's time to jet off to a far away crater and craft a new life, away from the noise and stress of modern life!

Grow quirky plants, craft amazing furniture, decorate your house, have the locals come to stay. Trade with friends, recruit a team of crafters and rise up the leagues!

Use your creativity & management skills to build your ultimate crater!

~~~~~~~~~
FEATURES
~~~~~~~~~
* Grow and harvest quirky plants
* Recruit a team of cute crafters
* Craft beautiful furniture
* Decorate your dream home & guest huts
* Rate other players' decorating skills
* Have locals come to stay
* Visit neighbouring players and trade items
* Fulfil order pallets and balloon shipments
* Build your ultimate crater

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
PLAYER REVIEWS
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
5/5 I love this game and its concept!

5/5 A fun nice twist on a farming game.

5/5 I love this type of city builder game.

5/5 Five stars for graphics, gaming, options & rewards…Wow!

5/5 Addictive, very cute and fun, definitely will recommend this to my friends and family.

~~~~~~~~
SUPPORT
~~~~~~~~
PLEASE NOTE! Crater Craft is free to download and play! However, some in-game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings. Players must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Crater Craft without parental consent. Network connection required.

iPhone 4S, iPad 2, iPad Mini (1st Gen) & iPod Touch (5th Gen) are currently not supported.

Enjoying Crater Craft? Learn more about the game here:
